title: build while from source got wrong version
body_html:
I am using cuda 9.1 but there is no prebuilt 0.4.1. So I build it myself.

  1. checkout tag v0.4.1
    git checkout tags/v0.4.1 -b 0.4.1
  2. following the doc, installing dependencies and build whl
    python setup.py bdist_wheel

But After I built successfully, I got ./dist/torch-0.5.0a0+a24163a-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl. Why I got a version of 0.5.0?

But After I built successfully, I got ./dist/torch-0.5.0a0+a24163a-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl. Why I got a version of 0.5.0?
body:
I am using cuda 9.1 but there is no prebuilt 0.4.1. So I build it myself. 
1. checkout tag v0.4.1
git checkout tags/v0.4.1 -b 0.4.1
2. following the doc, installing dependencies and build whl
python setup.py bdist_wheel

But After I built successfully, I got ./dist/torch-0.5.0a0+a24163a-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl. Why I got a version of 0.5.0?
